    public class CreatorActivity
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
implements android.widget.AdapterView.OnItemSelectedListener
    This class is handles Character Creating Layout and updates components when needed.

                          java.lang.String wanted)
        Method finds the correct index of the spinner item matching the actual character value and returns it.
